description: You awaken on scorched soil, the sky a dull red hue. Ash rains gently. You feel no pain, but something is... missing. A broken obelisk hums faintly.
A ruined altar. Symbols etched into the stone glow as you approach. The words twist but a single glyph matches the one on your hand.
Blackened trees claw upward like broken fingers. The smell of sulfur hangs thick. Something watches from the smoke.
A half-buried relic, part metal, part bone,reflects your face. Your eyes are unfamiliar. The relic pulses, showing flickers of ruined cities.

What remains of a village sleeps beneath layers of ash. Charred homes stand like tombstones, their windows dark. A few hollow-eyed survivors linger near the square, too weary to speak. The air tastes of soot and silence.
A narrow trail lined with molten footprints. It leads up the craterâ€™s edge, toward faint lights in the distance.
